root.name: Yamaha Supercross
root.description: The popularity of Supercross games has grown steadily since the 1970’s, making these events the second most popular form of motor sport in the United States. The game Yamaha Supercross involves racing customized high-performance off-road motorcycles on extreme man-made dirt tracks. Players master their bike handling skills over obstacles and steep jumps while racing fellow riders. Whether competing in the Championship Series or riding in stand-alone events, the track conditions can be affected by mud, bumps, and changing weather.
